title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app S-17
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app S-17

State Regulations
EXHIBIT A
SAFETY CHECK LIST............................................................................................................... Item............................................................................................................... Remarks............................................................................................................... 1. Grounds

Sidewalks, Pavements, Fences, etc. Check for cracks, tripping hazards and projecting wires, paying special attention to entrances, stairs, ramps, play areas and areas
around fire hydrants. Trees and Shrubs

Check for dead limbs and low branches. Play Areas

Check condition of equipment. Remove splintering play
logs. 2. Buildings

Roofs

Check for loose tiles and bricks. Keep free of
debris. Public Space (stairs, windows and doors)

Check for loose or cracked stairs, hard to open windows
and doors. Elevators

Check for leveling of car, operation of safety devices, regular servicing. Garbage Removal Station

Check for general cleanliness and security under foot. Availability of fire extinguishing equipment. Lighting

Check for adequacy, especially at stairs, ramps and
entrances. Meter Rooms

Check for fuse pullers and rubber mats in front of
panels; adequacy of ventilation in gas meter room. Incinerator Rooms

Check for safety goggles and excessive accumulation of
trash. Incinerator Hoppers

Check for proper closing, for sign prohibiting disposal
of explosion hazard items. Pump and Machinery Rooms

Check safety devices and guards, adequacy of light, ramps
and ladders. Storage Rooms

Check for accumulation of rubbish and combustibles. Community Centers and Recreational Rooms

Check exits, stairs, lighting, etc. Laundry Rooms

Check electrical and drain connections, lighting, etc. Lightning Rods

Check installation, connections and soil resistance. 3. Streets and Intersections

School Crossings, Traffic Signals and Signs

Check for general safety and adequacy; discuss with
proper authority if necessary. Bus Stop

Check for adequacy of lighting and presence of
signs. Parking Areas

Check for adequacy of lighting, and condition of curbs
and stops. 4. Maintenance Space

Shops, Electrical Tools, Boiler Room, Protective

Clothing, Employee Work Habits

Observe periodically and check for fire hazards, equipment hazards, safe work habits, etc. 5. Apartments

Heating Equipment, Ranges, Hardware, Windows and Window

Guards, etc. Check for safety and adequacy of equipment. Notes

S-17
